description: A crunchy, tangy way to enjoy mushrooms.
keywords: Bruschetta & crostini,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Mushroom,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Mushroom & Tarragon Bruschetta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g mixed mushrooms, washed, drained and sliced
1 medium white onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a non-stick pan to a medium heat and fry the mushrooms for 3 minutes.
Add the onion and garlic and herbs and fry for 4 minutes while tossing. Toast the sourdough bread for 4 minutes until crispy.
Place the mushroom mixture on the toasted sourdough, season to taste and drizzle with olive oil.
